TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit UpdateCheckInfo extends System.Object

summary.span: 表示通过调用 获得的详细更新信息。

span.span: Represents detailed update information obtained through a call to .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 与，你可以决定是升级 ClickOnce 应用程序基于最新版本的相关信息。With , you can decide whether to upgrade your ClickOnce application based on information about the newest version. 将返回一个布尔值，该值指示是否有新的更新根本。 will return a Boolean value indicating whether there is a new update at all. 属性提供的新版本的版本号时提供用户应已安装的最低版本。The property provides the version number of the new version, while provides the earliest version that the user should have installed. 表示是否需要用户的最新的可用更新。 expresses whether the latest available update is required of the user. 最后，表示更新的总大小。Finally, expresses the total size of the update. > [!NOTE] > Visual Studio 将添加``到清单仅当应用程序设置为检查更新，因此您是需要检查的元素**应用程序应检查更新**或指定在更新 URL**更新位置**中[应用程序更新对话框](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8eca8743-8e68-4d04-bfd5-4dc0a9b2934f)。Visual Studio adds the `` element to the manifest only if the application is set to check for updates, so you either have to check **The application should check for updates** or specify an update URL in **Update location** in the [Application Updates Dialog Box](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8eca8743-8e68-4d04-bfd5-4dc0a9b2934f). ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用以确定是否有新的应用程序更新，和来确定是否要求用户安装更新。The following code example uses to determine if there is a new application update, and to determine whether to ask the user to install the update. [!code-cpp[ClickOnceAPI#6](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ClickOnceAPI/cpp/form1.cpp#6)] [!code-csharp[ClickOnceAPI#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ClickOnceAPI/CS/Form1.cs#6)] [!code-vb[ClickOnceAPI#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ClickOnceAPI/VB/Form1.vb#6)]

MemberSignature.Value: public Version AvailableVersion { get; }
.property instance class System.Version AvailableVersion
Public ReadOnly Property AvailableVersion As Version
public: property Version ^ AvailableVersion { Version ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取尚未安装的最新版本的版本号。

span.span: Gets the version number of the latest uninstalled version.

value.span: 表示最新版本的主内部版本号、次内部版本号和修订号。

span.span: The expressing the major and minor build and revision numbers of the latest version.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 你可以使用来决定是否要安装此更新根据更新的严重性。You can use to decide whether to install the update based on the severity of the update. 例如，如果唯一或版本属性已更改，你的应用程序可能不需要更新之前或属性更改。For example, if only the or version properties have changed, your application may not need to update until either the or properties change.

MemberSignature.Value: public bool IsUpdateRequired { get; }
.property instance bool IsUpdateRequired
Public ReadOnly Property IsUpdateRequired As Boolean
public: property bool IsUpdateRequired { bool get(); };

summary.span: 获取一个指示是否必须安装更新的值。

span.span: Gets a value indicating whether the update must be installed.

value.span: 如果更新是必需的，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the update is required; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当你将更新部署到 ClickOnce 应用程序时，，您可以将其标记为必需的更新，信号传输到你的应用程序，它应立即升级。When you deploy an update to your ClickOnce application, you can mark it as a required update, signaling to your application that it should upgrade immediately. 你想要将应用程序的标记，如果最新版本包含的关键更新，或如果它与文件格式或使用的以前版本的后端数据源不兼容。You want to mark the application if the latest version contains a critical update, or if it is incompatible with file formats or back-end data sources used by the former version. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用来确定是否要求用户安装更新，或以无提示安装。The following code example uses to determine whether to ask the user to install the update, or to install it without prompting. [!code-cpp[ClickOnceAPI#6](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ClickOnceAPI/cpp/form1.cpp#6)] [!code-csharp[ClickOnceAPI#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ClickOnceAPI/CS/Form1.cs#6)] [!code-vb[ClickOnceAPI#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ClickOnceAPI/VB/Form1.vb#6)]

.property instance class System.Version MinimumRequiredVersion

public: property Version ^ MinimumRequiredVersion { Version ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取用户必须在计算机上安装的最低版本。

span.span: Gets the minimum version that the user must have installed on the computer.

value.span: 一个 ，它表示用户必须安装的最低版本。

span.span: A expressing the least version that the user must install.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当用户在特殊分配上采用参数或周或月为不在计算机旁，应用程序可以丢失所需的更新。Applications can miss required updates when the user takes on a special assignment or is away from the computer for weeks or months. 使用Use 若要确定用户是否具有不升级应用程序在一段时间，并已丢失一个或多个所需的更新。 to determine if the user has not upgraded the application in a while, and has missed one or more required updates. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何显示没有所需的更新可用时，向用户的属性。The following code example demonstrates displaying the property to the user when there is a required update available. [!code-cpp[ClickOnceAPI#6](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ClickOnceAPI/cpp/form1.cpp#6)] [!code-csharp[ClickOnceAPI#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ClickOnceAPI/CS/Form1.cs#6)] [!code-vb[ClickOnceAPI#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ClickOnceAPI/VB/Form1.vb#6)]

exception.span: 没有可供安装的新版本。

span.span: There is no new version available to install.
